original_text: And many were gathered together, so that there was no more room, not even at the door. And he was preaching the word to them.
korean_text: 많은 사람이 모여서 문 앞까지도 들어설 자리가 없게 되었는데 예수께서 그들에게 도를 말씀하시더니

sentences.original_text: so that there was no more room
And he was preaching the word to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 그들에게 말씀을 전파하고 있었습니다
